value.letterText:
A Necron tomb complex is awakening nearby. The complex will be initially dormant, so you can take time to decide how to attack it.

It may remain dormant until disturbed, or it may have a timer or proximity activators.

Even dormant tomb complexes aren't harmless. A dormant complex may assemble Necron warriors from time to time, or have some broader negative effect that must be dealt with eventually.
